data.text:
Play all kinds of drumroll and rimshot sounds from your phone! Just tap each sound pad to hear the drumroll/rimshot sound -- no complicated settings or options! This soundboard app is perfect for comedy club, any party or events, joking around, pranking your friends or just for pure fun! A drumroll is a series of drumbeats and is often used for social settings or events. Drumroll please!

About Our Soundboard Apps:

Our soundboard apps have been downloaded millions of times, and have been used for joking around with friends and family, to support favorite teams on game day and just for pure fun! Our apps have been featured in many famous worldwide publications.

Why download our apps?

- Easy to use, nice clean interface

- High-quality sounds (meticulously remastered to cut out any background noise)

- Loop option to play sound endlessly

- Random button to play sounds randomly

- Timer feature (select a specific time when to play sound)

- Help page / Contact us support

We hope you enjoy our apps and contact us if you have any questions or concerns.
